website_summaries.verdict: Perfect fit for a golf cart that has a long roof, and it will accommodate a cart for two or four people.
pros: You can put the cover on the cart quickly, as it has a rear zipper for convenience
Will fit carts with a roof up to 80 inches in height
Weather-protected fabric keeps water and dust off the cart
Elastic hem at the bottom of the cover ensures a tight fit
Available in two colors and two sizes
cons: Won't fit some golf cart models
Will not last a long time with sun exposure

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year in Middle East
customer_reviews.text: It was good at the beginning. But it lasted only one year in a Middle East country where dust wind and hot sunshine is common all year. About after 10 months, it started tear down on a small stretch while I am covering it. It became complete rags after exactly one year and I had to buy other one. However, I think other accessories such as underneath strap, bottom elastic cord, and vents are very good design. I recommend, therefore, it can be good if it is going to be used in a good weather conditions, but go get a better and heavy one if you want to keep it longer in a worse conditions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit Club Car DS OEM short roof other size options available
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Club Car DS easy to take on and off and the storage bag is attached , easy access to the rear compartment zipper seems quality made this is also marked front so you don’t get lost putting it on , I was able to get it on alone it does have elastic around the back and front to fit snug , it also had areas you could add a bungee cord or tie down but on a average day it seems to be staying on but for deep storage has that option
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good, but drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the second summer to cover my golf cart when not at camp. It has physically held up very well. Zipper still runs smooth. The cover has faded an awful lot. It looks awful now. Functional, but looks terrible. I've also noticed a good bit of mildew on my seats. I'm assuming this isn't allowing enough airflow. It seems to keep the cart dry, but traps moisture. Concerned that may, in addition to mold/mildew, facilitate rust. Would I buy again? For the price and to not have my cart completely exposed, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof co
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a golf cart and needed a cover. This cover is nice quality and fits over the cart nicely. Be careful when ordering because it asks you for the roof size. I initially ordered for a short roof but that one only covers a cart with no back seat. I ordered the next size up and it fits over the cart. The roof part does hang down a bit because I only have a short roof on my cart but it at least covers the entire cart nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M Taylor

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT WARRENTY
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cover one year ago and have had it in the Florida sun every day since. A few weeks ago we noticed it was starting to develop a hole on a stress point. I looked up the warrenty, sent a few pictures and an explanation email. The company never questioned us and a new cover is being shipped now. The cover itself is very good quality, easy on/off and protects our golf cart as expected. I think had we not had the cover in direct Florida sun it would have lasted much longer. We would definitely suggest this cover to others looking for a quality product with an excellent warranty.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe we struggled with our old rigid golf cart cover as long as we did. This thing made a chore much easier. It fits our cart easily. It is marked "front". I am 5'2" and I just wad it up at the front of the cart, throw it all up on top and pull it down all around. I can do it myself in a minute (no cussing)! We have had this for some time now and it still looks new, no fading or tearing. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori E. Brackeen

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these for myself and friends we are very well pleased with the cover I've had one for over a year and it's still in good shape a little faded but still serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Matt F.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to put on the cart. My old one I struggled doing my self I would get it half way on and then the other side would fall. This is a breeze to put on. It's very light weight so if you don't want that, don't order this. It does the job for what I need. The only reason I didn't give it all 5 stars all the way around is mine doesn't go as low as the pic shows to the middle to lower tire. Mine is right at the top of the tire but still fine for what I need. Very lightweight material.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cart and this is a very good quality material. I thought it would be thin and flimsy but it is not. It's made well and durable, and rain resistant. Easy to put on and take off and fits a standard cart nicely. Would recommend this absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Frances S.

customer_reviews.title: Putting it to the test
customer_reviews.text: Working out great. Covers my custom cart in the high heat of the desert. The sun destroys everything in time in the desert. I think for the money it is protecting my golf cart. Hoping it last a second season.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Gina Ann Orban

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a 6 passenger golf cart.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit with what seems to be good quality material. Like the rear zipper access and the attached rings on the bottom for using straps to hold it in place. Much better than the pull chord design of other covers.
customer_reviews.author: rac9299

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a replacement to my old one-the old one lasted 2 years and would have lasted more but I stupidly took it off when there was ice on it and it ripped. I have a club cart with the long top
customer_reviews.author: Harry0

customer_reviews.title: Good fit on Club Car with front and rear seat
customer_reviews.text: It fits my Club Car golf cart with a rear seat I have a 3 inch lift that is just an inch off the ground but the cover can be secured with the straps
customer_reviews.author: Dimples

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality but still bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Material faded and became brittle to the point of ripping apart over one season. This being said I really like that iit repelled water very well and is a snug fit. This time around I kept the instruction booklet and receipt and will make sure to get a warranty replacement if it fails again within the fist year
customer_reviews.author: Ilike2Read

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works for our lifted custom EZGO RXV. It doesn't cover the tires but body and interior are protected. Good quality. No complaints. Like the self storing pouch that is attached.
customer_reviews.author: LS60941

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Used this got my golf cart. This is the second one I bought and I payed more for it this time around. Fits great
customer_reviews.author: Ka1965

customer_reviews.title: Works OK. Keeps rain and dirt out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works OK. Keeps rain and dirt out of the cart when stored outside. It's water repellent but not proof. Water pools at the top and seeps thru.
customer_reviews.author: A MACDO

customer_reviews.title: No tie down straps included.
customer_reviews.text: Cover has 4 D rings attached to the bottom edge, two on each side. No straps or cords included to use for securing the cover to the cart.???
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: STORAGE BAG COME ATTACHED TO COVEE
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and cover my 2015 E-Z-GO golf cart, was good about it carrying (storage) bag come attached to cover for easy storage
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well and keeps blowing off. Elastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit well and keeps blowing off. Elastic is not tight enough and no grommets to tie it down and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Auto Terry

customer_reviews.title: 2004 DS
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2004 Club Car DS (no rear seats,standard roof) just like a golf cart cover should. I don’t think this cover is meant for long term outdoor protection. Warranty says 2 years mftr defects only which means it will be worn out if left outside for that amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: “Amazing”

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with cover. Fit perfectly on my 2016 ez go golf cart. The cover is made of strong material and it is big enough to cover the cart with the reversed back seat attachment covering all the way down to the tires snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Noble one

customer_reviews.title: Great golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover, fits great, doesn’t pool water when it rains and is easy to put on with two people. A little harder to put on with one person but it’s doable.
customer_reviews.author: GYC

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my Easy Go two seater golf cart. Goes on easily (one person can do it) and I really like the elastic at the bottom. Looks great. Great so far for summer storage between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Echogirlie

customer_reviews.title: smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: good quality but does not fit as expected, supposed to fit a 4 passenger cart, barely covers back seat and only comes to the top of the tires
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable cover
customer_reviews.text: We have had cover for several months now. Very pleased with durability in all types of weather. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trena Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 year the canvas showed wear and started tearing. The cart was outside but under carport.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Janssens

customer_reviews.title: HOLDS UP VERY WELL FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Have bought a lot of different covers for our golf cart in the past and this one is by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Larry J Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit and good quality! I would recommend hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My cart is a standard EZGO RVX. The cover fitment was very good The quality of the cover is excellent and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Probably going to have to replace it every year or so in the NC sun, but the price is right for that sort of schedule
customer_reviews.author: BuckTundra88

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction and hold up in winter and summer conditions here in Northern Illinois.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my EZGO TXT with front rack and back seat pretty well. This is made for a 6 passenger cart, but work for my application.
customer_reviews.author: jweldit

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very easy to put on and take off even for someone short. I did find the ropes were not heavy enough to toss from one side of the cart to the other to secure the cover. I resolved the issue with longer bungee cords that are adjustable in length.
customer_reviews.author: PATTIE B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good winter protector when you have little space under roof.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Armey

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2012 Yamaha G29 with 80inch roof and rear seat perfectly. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our golf cart we keep at beach.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not even last 1 full summer and the sun tore it up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove!!!! I only wish it came with the tie downs...
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cover and it seems great. Will have to see after a season or two of use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it fits
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a year now and sooooo far it is holding up quite well. I like the way it fits. I like the zipper in the back and the snap which helps hold it together once installed. I also like the loops on the bottom so I can tie the bottom securely. I have been impressed with how well it holds up with some of the rain and wind we have had. It has never blown off or come loose since I have owned it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Old Soldier

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I incorrectly ordered a size larger than I need. However, still fits nicely and is easy to use. Repels water nicely and I love that it is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amie DeMars

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Better with Two people to get it done right.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to get on and over the cart without a second person. Even trickier getting it to wrap back up and into the bag that’s stitched into the cover but so far has done good for us the few times I’ve used it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DG

customer_reviews.title: Lifted EZGO
customer_reviews.text: Great fit if you buy the long roof cover and your cart is lifted.
customer_reviews.author: dereck collins

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, protects my Golf Cart
customer_reviews.text: It works and fits great on my Club Car DS
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Just wish we could still use our screen.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but needs another part to allow screen to be used. We had to mount it on the slider side. Seals much better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Burk

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and easy off!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and remove! Easy to store! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: FLO

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: We use our 2 seater cart at a camp resort over a 5 month season. Every week or so we head home and cover the cart. This cover is very easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar the Wild

customer_reviews.title: It was much larger in measurements than advertised. We ...
customer_reviews.text: It was much larger in measurements than advertised. We had to purchase additional ties to keep it from blowing off our golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Cover lasted 11 months all rotten,
customer_reviews.text: Cover lasted 11 months all rotten, will be ok to cover your golf cart from dirt but not to be used to protect from weather (sun and rain)
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Garcia

customer_reviews.title: ... it goes half way down the wheels and tires love it and totally
customer_reviews.text: My cart has a 7in lift kit on it and 14in wheels with sahara off road tires on it and the cover covers the whole cart and it goes half way down the wheels and tires love it and totally waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moura

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Tomberlin emerge (pretty uncommon Long cart) this fits it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Faded quick, material got rotten, ripped at top and some seams

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover. So far it seems to be holding up well.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits great, and seems to be very well made. will see how it holds up hiding my golf cart

customer_reviews.title: Dry rotted and torn
customer_reviews.text: Had this 13 months and now has dry rotted and ripped

customer_reviews.title: It Fits!
customer_reviews.text: It fits, it is a little long but it covers the Star EV cart. The roof on the Star is 90".

customer_reviews.title: The quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color but it didn't fit as well as i thought it should. Had no way to tighten it. Club car seat covers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!

customer_reviews.text: Really like this cover. Worth the money and the price isn't bad good quality material

customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my EZ-GO golf cart. Prevented any rain from entering during the wettest June in history in western PA.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and perfect fit for a Club Car golf cart.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Fast shipping. Perfect fit for a short-roof golf cart!

customer_reviews.text: Have a 2010 Yamaha Drive which it says it fits but really needs to be about 4 to 6" taller

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Good for just a storage cover but I needed a heavy duty one for travelling. Apparently not available. If there are some somewhere I would like to know.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Perfect fit for our Club Car.

customer_reviews.title: Covers all the neccesities
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to slip on and off. The air vents on the rear keep the cover from inflating. It is exactly what we wanted. Love the elastic around the bottom and the zipper. Great purchase.

customer_reviews.text: I have a lifted golf cart and this cover fits great.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and a great buy for the money.

customer_reviews.text: This cover was not water repellant. I had to buy a spray to make it water repellent

customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Wish it were a little taller and came with ties. I’ll post more after a while to comment about performance.

customer_reviews.title: Works for our 4 seat Club Car
customer_reviews.text: This fits our Club Car four seater almost perfectly, and I was able to put it on single handedly on a windy day. I like the zipper in the back which allows you to peek inside to check for moisture as well as making it easier to remove and put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Shopperguy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is made of good quality material and fits nicely.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite recent purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite recent purchases. It is well made and very easy to put on and take off. I love the zipper compartment in the back that allows me access to the back without taking the entire cover off. It is very durable and I think it will last a very long time. It is well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the EZGo Express S4 pretty nicely. Had my doubts but
customer_reviews.text: Fits the EZGo Express S4 pretty nicely. Had my doubts but, material and fit are almost ideal for this cart. Would recommend

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and tailoring on a "short roof" 2-seater Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Best golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality golf cart cover! It is so easy to put on your golf cart and it covers the whole thing up nicely. I recommend buying a size up, just to make sure it covers the cart all the way up. Buy this cover!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love your product . i use it to cover the center console of my boat. very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. elastic around bottom helps hold it on in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. elastic around bottom helps hold it on in the wind
customer_reviews.author: Fred F.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good, but Not Totally Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover a Cricket SX-3 cart that has a roof. Fit is good. Comes with an attached stuff sack. Dries quickly. Keeps most of the rain water off the cart. However, it is not waterproof. Some rain does get through the fabric onto the cart. Had it covering the cart for two full days of rain, heavy at times. Some water was inside but not near enough to get to the electronics or seats. If I had it to do over, I would still buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Club Car DS with lift and rear seat
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 1992 Club Car DS with a 6" lift and rear seat perfectly covers just like photo around 3" of tire showing on all sides. The fabric is nice and thick which is a plus as my cart sits out all summer at camp under some pretty nasty trees. Hopefully this lasts a several seasons like the previous Fairway cover did.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for coverage needed in the area that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for coverage needed in the area that it is used. Material is great for keeping everything from getting to my golf cart. I had to order the cover for the long roof because of an aluminum bed that I have on the back of my cart. Coverage meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my cart that has a full-length top. I am planning on rebuilding the cart this spring, and the inside of the cover is staying completely dry even in OREGON!
customer_reviews.author: RAI

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf cart cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover was delivered on time and I was impressed with the quality of the product. The cover fit extremely well, much better than my last one. Easy to put on and off and it looks good while protecting my cart.

customer_reviews.title: fits great looks great just a nice cover

customer_reviews.text: No rips yet! Took it on and off 5-6 times. I'll see how it does this winter and give an update.

customer_reviews.title: This looks great new. After 2
customer_reviews.text: This looks great new. After 2.5 months of use it has faded significantly and looks grey on the upper half. I am sad to say I am not totally satisfied. Would not buy again.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for our Club Car golf cart with front seats and and a utility bed on the back. It fits perfect and keeps the cart dry even in terrible Texas storms. I would recommend this cover to anyone.

customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 2001 EZ-go gas cart with fold down rear seat. Lightweight yet seems like tough material. I'll see how it holds up through the winter.

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Fairway Golf Cart Quick Fit Cover
product_meta.description: The Fairway Golf Cart Quick-Fit Cover will fit a long roof up to 80" L roof. This cover has rear air vents to reduce wind lofting and inside moisture, and an elasticized cord in the bottom hem for a customized fit. Made of tough fabric, this golf cart cover won't shrink or stretch and has water-repellent fabric, thus giving you a long term usage despite weather conditions. The rear zipper give you easy entry and installation. Tie-down straps prevent blow off and comes with an integrated storage bag.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Khaki cover fits most four-person golf cart
Fits long Roof up to 80 inch
Weather protected fabric won't shrink or stretch
Rear zipper for easy entry and installation
Rear vents reduce wind lofting and inside moisture
Fits most four person golf carts with up to 80" long roofs
Elastic cord in bottom hem for a custom fit
Protects golf cars from sun, weather damage and dirt
